---
title: Git Ignore
description: Prevent sensitive files and generated artifacts from being committed to version control.
---

```text title=".gitignore"
# Node
node_modules/
npm-debug.log
yarn-error.log

# Titan build output (auto-generated — DO NOT COMMIT)
server/routes.json
server/action_map.json
server/actions/*.jsbundle
server/titan/*.jsbundle

# Rust build output (auto-generated — DO NOT COMMIT)
server/target/
server/target/**

# Logs
*.log

# System files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Environment files
.env
.env.local
```
